meanings.sent1: Her skin was scarless after the surgery.
meanings.sent2: The newborn baby had a scarless face.
meanings.sent3: The cat boasted a scarless fur coat, much to the envy of the other pets.
meanings.sent4: The untouched snow was a scarless blanket covering the ground.
meanings.sent5: The scarless sky stretched endlessly above us, a perfect blue expanse.

meanings.sent1: The clean mirror reflected her scarless reflection.
meanings.sent2: The scarless vase gleamed on the mantelpiece.
meanings.sent3: The scarless bookshelf stood proudly in the corner, untouched by time.
meanings.sent4: The scarless lake mirrored the clear blue sky above.
meanings.sent5: The scarless apple looked too perfect to be real, like a work of art.
